column4: This is probably one of the most commonly asked questions, but I am having trouble finding something that works:  I just got a new monitor.  Was a CRT at 1024x768.  I now have a Viewsonic LCD at 1680x1050.  I cannot seem to make Xorg use 1680x1050, and I cannot seem to make it show up in my screen resolution menu.  Any suggestions?
great program for editing tags... if you like it, Quod Libet is a great player that goes along with it
thanx for the advice, I will try out that player.
it's got tons of plugins, does pretty much everything... not quite as nice looking as amarok, but seems to be lighter on resources
